title: [Bug Report: Text/Gameplay] Ardent Censer / Enchantment: Cinderhulk
body:
Summary: *Ardent Censer* does not interact with resistance shields as would be reasonably interpreted from its text.

Platform: Windows 7, Windows 10 (Technical Preview) Mac OS X (Mavericks).

Details: *Ardent Censer* reads, 'Your heals and shields on another unit grant 25% AS for 6 seconds.' without granting AS to units affected by Bulwark ('Galio shields an allied champion or himself for 4 seconds, increasing their armor and magic resistance') and Molten Shield ('Annie grants herself and Tibbers, if he is active, a shield of fire for 5 seconds that grants bonus armor and magic resistance').

Reproducibility: 10/10
_______________

Summary: *Enchantment: Cinderhulk* does not interact with non-item, non-Rune sources of bonus HP.

Platform: Windows 7, Windows 10 (Technical Preview)

Details: 

*Enchantment: Cinderhulk* stat text: '350 HP, 25% bonus HP [...]'; 

Despite this however, sources of bonus HP present in:

- Nunu (Consume [Elemental flavor]), 
- Sion (Soul Furnace [passive component]), 
- Vladimir (Crimson Pact) 
- Cho'Gath (Feast [on kill]) 

are not multiplied on purchase. 

Reproducibility: 10/10

________________

Summary: *Enchantment: Cinderhulk* briefly displays extremely high maximum HP on purchase, particularly as Nunu.

 Platform: Windows 7, Windows 10 (Technical Preview) 

Details: *Enchantment: Cinderhulk* displays values 50% higher than would reasonably be expected for one second after purchase, and up to 70% higher as Nunu.

Reproducibility: 10/10
_________________

Supplementary Resources: N/A



A Riot specialist (Queen of Blades) suggested that I post to the OCE boards. If this is in error, please inform me and provide a better location?

replies.body:
>Details: Ardent Censer reads, 'Your heals and shields on **another unit** grant 25% AS for 6 seconds.' without granting AS to units affected by Bulwark, ('Galio shields an allied champion or himself for 4 seconds, increasing their armor and magic resistance') and Molten Shield ('Annie grants herself and Tibbers, if he is active, a shield of fire for 5 seconds that grants bonus armor and magic resistance').

I believe your missing the point of ANOTHER unit, you can't affect yourself (annie shield) and Galio shield should only give AS for if he puts it on an Ally.

However then the question is are they running it properly for tibbers on Annie's that build Ardent Censer (why would you do this?)
